arguments.description: Substring for which to search.  Optionally pass a Struct with key/value pairs to do a replace all
arguments.name: substring1

arguments.description: Substring with which to replace the found matches.  This arg is required if the substring1 arg is a string
arguments.name: substring2

arguments.description:
scope for the execution:
- one (default): replaces only the first occurrence	
- all: replaces all occurrences
arguments.name: scope

description:
Replaces occurrences of substring1 in a string with substring2,
        in a specified scope. The search is case-sensitive.
name: replace
